PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# <> "Standalone" OR "Managed Domain" : PRINT "&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# must be either Standalone or Managed Domain" : EXIT 1 :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_PACKAGE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_PACKAGE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_HOME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
! Validates application name, spaces should not be there :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#) :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# = '' : PRINT Application name must not be empty. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF :SET &SPACE_CHECK# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#, ' ') :IF &SPACE_CHECK# > 0 : PRINT Application name must not contain space. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
!---------------------- Get Package name from path ---------------------- :SET &FINAL_SLASH# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_JBOSS_PACKAGE#, "/")
:IF &FINAL_SLASH# > 0 : SET &PACKAGE_PARENT_DIR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_PACKAGE#, 1, &FINAL_SLASH#) : SET &FINAL_SLASH# = ADD(&FINAL_SLASH#, 1) : SET &PACKAGE_NAME# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_PACKAGE#, &FINAL_SLASH#) :ELSE : PRINT Deployment Package Path is not valid. Aborting ... : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
!---------------------- Deploy command ---------------------- :SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deploy \"&PACKAGE_NAME#\"' :SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#'
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_UPDATE# = "YES" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# --force' :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# --all-server-groups' : ELSE : SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# --server-groups=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#' : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY# = '&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY#"'
!----------------------
!Escaped jboss-cli.sh set NOPAUSE="True"
if [ ! -d "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" fi
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="quit" | grep "Failed to connect to the controller"` if [ "$output" ]; then echo "JBoss is not running or cannot connect to JBoss CLI using the given inputs. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi
echo "Checking deployment information ..."
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#"`
echo "$output" | grep -v "ARATools\|Version\:\|Date\:\|GmbH"
if [ -z "`echo "$output" | grep " not found"`" ]; then : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_EXISTING# = "NO" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_UPDATE# = "YES" echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# already exists. The application will be overwritten." : ELSE echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# already exists. Aborting ..." exit 0 : ENDIF : ELSE echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# already exists. Aborting ..." exit 1 : ENDIF fi
!---------- Deployment ------------ echo "Deploying &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# on JBoss EAP 6.1 (&UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE#) ..." cd "&PACKAGE_PARENT_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI_DEPLOY#` :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD_CUSTOM@UNIX
! --force option can not be used with --server-groups or --all-server-groups. Separate to 2 commands. :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_UPDATE# = "YES" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="undeploy --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# --all-relevant-server-groups --keep-content"`
: IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deploy --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# --all-server-groups"` : ELSE output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deploy --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# --server-groups=&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#"` : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD_CUSTOM@UNIX : ENDIF :ENDIF
!---------------------------------
echo "Deployment finished. Check if deployment &UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# exists:"
output=`&UC4_JBOSS_CLI# --command="deployment-info --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME#"` :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD_CUSTOM@UNIX
if [ "`echo "$output" | grep " not found"`" ] ; then exit 1 fi
! In case of Managed Domain, package must be added to specified server group, unless --force option is available. :IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = "Managed Domain" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_UPDATE# = "NO" : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS# = "" if [ "`echo "$output" | grep " not added *$"`" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is not assigned to all server groups. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi : ELSE : DEFINE &SERVER_GROUPS#,string, 100 : FILL &SERVER_GROUPS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_SERVER_GROUPS#,",") : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] NE "" if [ "`echo "$output" | grep "&SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#] " | grep " not added *$"`" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_JBOSS_APP_NAME# is not assigned to &SERVER_GROUPS#[&VAR#]. Aborting ..." exit 1 fi : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
echo "Deploy Application successfully."
